page.title: 18Milnathort Playgroup
page.content: Milnathort Playgroup meets in the town hall. Young children from Milnathort used to attend Kinross Playgroup, but the idea of a nearer group became attractive to{Milnathort and Orwell parents. After investigating several possible locations for a playgroup,including the school,{Milnathort Town Hall}was chosen. The hall now has guards round the radiators, and a door handle high up out of the reach of young children, among other safety measures taken. {Tayside Regional Council}was then able to give some financial help to start the playgroup. The parents hold fund-raising events, which prove to be successful. This year the playgroup donated money to the primary school as a token of thanks for the help and co-operation received since the playgroup started.
